original_title: Albert Lee & Hogan's Heroes: Live at Stazione Birra
overview: This is a brand new live DVD featuring Grammy Award winning guitarist Albert Lee and his band Hogan's Heroes. Filmed live in Rome - Italy, the DVD captures Albert and band in full flight. Delivering a stunning set of country rock 'n' roll numbers to a very enthusiastic crowd. Some of the tracks included are "Roadrunner," "Every Time I Roll the Dice," "Brand New Heartache," "Fool's Gold" and many more.
title: Albert Lee & Hogan's Heroes: Live at Stazione Birra
